title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 600.3 - Use of authority facilitities conditional
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 600.3 - Use of authority facilitities conditional

State Regulations

The use of the facilities by any person or vehicle shall be
deemed to be conditioned upon payment of the tolls set forth and upon
observance of the rules and regulations set forth in this

Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
600.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
